data.text:
@VoteWillows @WpgLoganberries @oneteachervoice @MBGov Here’s the article. It’s from October. 

https://t.co/DCb8ajsnKm

@VoteWillows @WpgLoganberries @oneteachervoice @MBGov Ok. Where is this info? All I can find related to Newfoundland+Covid+Red Cross is that nurses from Newfoundland were sent by the Red Cross to (drum roll please)…..
.
.
.
Alberta. Con government.

I’m open to a reliable source that says otherwise.

@VG_Robo @oneteachervoice @TheWolseleyElm I have no idea what you are talking about in the first part of this last tweet?
What stupid shit was I conned into? Exactly?

@VG_Robo @oneteachervoice @TheWolseleyElm My generation? You have some anger issues there sweetheart. 
My generation is the reason you are alive.
@WpgLoganberries @oneteachervoice @MBGov And are those governments also dropping the isolation requirement for positive cases?

@RachelWLoewen @oneteachervoice @TheWolseleyElm The only thing I am afraid of is that people like you get to vote, when your knowledge about the world is based on falsehoods and absurd arrogance.
The world will be a better place when your broken-ass generation gets out of the fucking way.
